venue.address_2: The Shoppes at Blackstone Valley Mall
venue.name: Blackstone Valley Cinema 14

item.description:
"The Fantastic Mr. Fox" is a new animated film from director Wes Anderson, starring the voices of George Clooney, Meryl Streep, and Bill Murray. Mr. Fox steals chickens from nearby farmers, and the farmers scheme to get rid of him. And Mr. Fox and his friends and family fight back.

I saw the trailer, and it looks like an entertaining film. Anyone who wants to can join me for dinner and conversation afterwards.

The movie is showing on Sunday at 4:25 PM at the Blackstone Valley Cinema. Let's meet in the lobby at 4:00. Feel free to call my cell phone: 508-981-0455.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Fantastic Mr. Fox - Blackstone Valley Cinema
